+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #658850 +++

Since the updater can't currently deal with symbolic links, bug 668869 has made it so that thunderbird and thunderbird-bin are really the same binary, duplicated.

Once Firefox work out a way forward, we'll do the same for Thunderbird
comments.creator: standard8@mozilla.com
